definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
Sir Li Ka-shing (1928-), Hong Kong businessman
variant of 開誠布公|开诚布公[kai1 cheng2 bu4 gong1]

sentences.english: If You Are The One keeps the typical humor of Feng Xiaogang.
sentences.chinese: 《非誠勿擾》保留了一貫的“馮式幽默”。

sentences.english: What a precious gift honesty is in the midst of so much dishonesty.
sentences.chinese: 在如此多的欺騙中，誠實時如此的難能可貴。

sentences.english: Xiamen Bincheng Wood Co. , Ltd. was established in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 廈門彬誠木業有限公司於2005年成立。

sentences.english: The joy of a morning in spring, the faith of a mustard seed.
sentences.chinese: 春日清晨的歡愉，芥末種子的信誠。

sentences.english: His insincerity is revealed by the quick goggle of his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他眼睛的快速轉動泄露了他的不誠。

sentences.english: Fu Kecheng, chairperson of Jiangxi Political Consultative Conference and Board chairman Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 江西省政協主席傅克誠與鄭元豹董事長合影留念。

sentences.english: "Friend" you are not more honest you can.
Li Ming is just the tyke ( whom ) I wish to see.
sentences.chinese: 李明正是表錯七日情想要見非誠勿擾男孩。

sentences.english: If you are the one, you can free shipping on any area of Yantai city.
sentences.chinese: 非誠勿擾，可以免費送貨煙臺市任何區。

sentences.english: Let me reiterate our sincere regret regarding these problems.
sentences.chinese: 請允許敝公司重申對此問題的誠摰歉意。

sentences.english: Shanghang Fulongcheng Home Furnishings Co. , Ltd. was founded in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 上杭福龍誠家居製品有限公司成立於2009年。

sentences.english: As in Shinkai"s previous works, Tenmon composes for this film"s soundtrack.
sentences.chinese: 和新海誠以前的作品一樣，天門負責電影的音樂。

sentences.english: Chen Cheng, army chief of staff, declared the war would soon be over.
sentences.chinese: 蔣軍參謀總長陳誠聲言戰爭不久即可結束。

sentences.english: Staffs with high reputation is the guarantee of the development of Xinyue.
sentences.chinese: 高素質的員工團隊，是尊誠健康發展的保障。

sentences.english: It is a perfect interpretation of the brand image of GaoCheng.
sentences.chinese: 對高誠品牌形象做了一次完美的詮釋。

sentences.english: "Service" is the guidance principle and the basis to success of SMEE , we are striving all along.
sentences.chinese: 服務是志誠企業的宗旨和立身之本，我們一直在努力。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
